article.name: Mendomic Bevels
article.description:
I make up words all the time! Its great fun. Just listen to a funny that someone says... and make up your own spelling of it!
Anyhow, \'Mendomic\' bevels. Funny shapes bevelled up to give them a it more depth, even realism.
(Note: creating things that look \'real\', or could be \'real\' is a hot area of digital design)
Anyhow, these objects are the result of a bevelled effect applied to shapes created using my Flash mendomic shape creator.
The origins of that project were a direct copy of work by Jared Tarbel, from his excellent site http://www.levitated.net .
article.keywords: mendomic bevels funny shapes flash layers circles black and white real digital design bevelled depth image flash
